mapper.insert: insert into reboard (reseq,retitle,recontent,rephoto, email, retime ,relike) values (RESEQ_REBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{retitle}, #{recontent}, #{rephoto}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP , 0)
mapper.select: select m.name,r.reseq,r.retitle,r.retime,r.relike from member m join reboard r on m.email = r.email
